articles.title: From 'Jawan' to 'Barbie', 10 most searched movies of 2023 - IndiaTimes
articles.description: This year was a bash for the entertainment industry as the audience got numerous blockbuster movies to watch in the theatre. Shah Rukh Khan's 'Jawan' has topped the list of the most googled Hindi films this year. Speaking of 'Jawan', it secured the third spot…
